flowSelection.whyChooseDesc: Har tareeka aapki complete profile banayega. Jo aasaan lage wo choose karein. Aap baad mein details badal sakte hain.
flowSelection.voiceNext: Aap hamare voice assistant se baat karenge jo questions poochega aur aapke answers record karega
flowSelection.formNext: Aap apni skills, experience aur preferences ka ek simple form bharenge
flowSelection.resumeNext: Apna resume upload karein aur hum automatically aapki details extract kar lenge

voiceBotIntro.title: TipTop Voice Assistant
voiceBotIntro.greeting: Namaste! Main aapki profile complete karne mein help karunga.
voiceBotIntro.description: Main aapse kuch questions poochunga aur aapke answers ke basis pe aapki profile banaunga.
features: Hum aapki privacy ka samman karte hain

skills.title: Apne Skills Choose Karein
skills.subtitle: Skills choose karein
skills.openToAnyWork: Main naya hoon aur kisi bhi kaam ke liye ready hoon
skills.infoMessage: Wo saari skills select karein jo aap par apply hoti hain. Aap apni profile se baad mein aur skills add kar sakte hain.
skills.voiceGuidance: Yahaan skills hain. Agar aap kisi bhi kaam ke liye ready hain, to top option select karein. Ya specific skills choose karein. Aap hamesha baad mein change kar sakte hain.

verificationInfo.title: Skill Verification
verificationInfo.description: Aapki skills currently unverified hain. Jaise-jaise aap jobs complete karenge wo verified hongi:
verificationInfo.profileDescription: Jab aap jobs complete karte hain aur aapka supervisor un tasks pe aapko rating deta hai tab aapki skills verified hongi. Ek baar verified hone ke baad, aapko certified kiya jayega.
verificationInfo.howToProgress: Apne skills ko kaise improve karein:

jobs.title: Jobs
jobs.completeProfileToApply: Apply karne ke liye profile complete karein

location.title: Aap kahan rehte hain?
location.subtitle: Aapke paas ki jobs dikhane ke liye humein aapki location chahiye
location.dragPinToAdjust: Adjust karne ke liye pin drag karein

distance.title: Aap kitni door tak travel kar sakte hain?
distance.subtitle: Apni job search radius set karein
distance.infoTitle: Aap ise kabhi bhi badal sakte hain
distance.infoDesc: Hum aapko is radius ke andar jobs dikhayenge. Aap ise baad mein apni profile settings se adjust kar sakte hain.
distance.updateError: Profile update karne mein fail. Please phir se try karein.

introduction.tagline: Apne sapnon ki job paane ka sabse aasaan tareeka

earning.title: Izzat Se Kamao
earning.description: Verified companies se guaranteed payment wali jobs
earning.point2: Multiple payment options - aapki convenience ke liye
earning.point3: Transparent salary - koi hidden charges nahi

learning.title: Seekho
learning.description: Industry-recognized certifications ke saath apne skills ko next level par le jao
learning.point1: NSDC certified courses - kai free bhi hain
learning.point2: CSR-funded programs - companies aapke training sponsor karti hain
learning.point3: Experts se practical skills - Learn on the job

growing.title: Aage Badho
growing.description: Har job se better opportunities unlock karo aur apni earning potential badhao
growing.point1: Skills verify karke premium jobs unlock karo

smartFeatures.title: Smart Technology
smartFeatures.description: AI-powered platform jo samajhta hai aapki zaroorat aur deta hai best opportunities
smartFeatures.point1: AI matching - aapke liye perfect jobs automatically
smartFeatures.point2: Live tracking - application status real-time mein dekho
smartFeatures.point3: Interview prep - video tips aur practice sessions

about.title: AHALTS Academy Ke Baare Mein
about.description: AHALTS Academy ek leading skill development organization hai jo gig workers ko empower karta hai quality training aur job opportunities ke saath.
about.mission: Humara mission hai har Indian gig worker ko skills, jobs aur growth opportunities provide karna taaki wo apne aur apne family ke liye better future bana sakein.

nsdc.title: NSDC Partnership
nsdc.description: National Skill Development Corporation ke saath partnership ke through, hum government-recognized certifications provide karte hain jo aapki employability ko significantly badhate hain.

csr.title: CSR-Funded Training
csr.description: Corporate Social Responsibility funds ke through, hum free training programs offer karte hain. Aapko koi paisa nahi dena padta - companies aapki training sponsor karti hain.

verification.title: Skill Verification System
verification.description: Jobs complete karke aur good ratings leke, aap apne skills ko verify kar sakte ho. Verified skills se aapko better jobs aur higher pay milti hai.

stats.activeJobSeekersDesc: Active job seekers opportunities dhoondh rahe hain
stats.jobsPostedDesc: Har mahine post ki gayi jobs
stats.trustedEmployersDesc: Trusted employers hire kar rahe hain
stats.interviewRateDesc: Job seekers ko 7 din mein interviews milte hain

resume.dragDrop: Apna resume yahan drag & drop karein
resume.parseSuccessDesc: Humne aapki information extract kar li hai. Aap ise agli steps mein review aur edit kar sakte hain.
